file_insights.changes_summary: Added shortcutKey prop to QuickFilterChip instances

patterns_discovered: Consistent shortcut key assignment for filter chips
Mnemonic shortcut keys matching first letter of filter type (A/M/T/V)
gotchas_discovered: Shortcut keys were previously missing from QuickFilterChip components
No automatic handling of keyboard events for these shortcuts yet
recommendations: Implement keyboard event handler to actually trigger filters via shortcut keys
Consider adding a tooltip or help text to inform users about available shortcuts
Validate that shortcut keys do not conflict with other application-level keyboard events
